name: Standard Membership
benefits: Access to all monthly meetings;Monthly society newsletter;Access to the member-only section of the website;Borrowing privileges from the club's library
description: Our standard membership, perfect for enthusiasts of all levels.

name: Premium Membership
benefits: All Standard Membership benefits;Free entry to one paid workshop per year (up to $75 value);10% discount on all other paid workshops;Early registration access for limited-space events;One-on-one consultation with a club expert
description: For the dedicated enthusiast looking to accelerate their learning.

name: Digital Membership
benefits: Access to member-only section of the website;Digital access to our monthly newsletter;Live streams of monthly meetings and select workshops;Access to our digital resource library
description: For our long-distance friends who want to be part of the community online.
